name: Zoodiac Gathering
text: If a "Zoodiac" Xyz Monster you control would activate its effect by detaching its own Xyz Material(s), you can detach that many Xyz Material(s) from another Xyz Monster you control instead. You can only use this effect of "Xiangke of the Zoodiac" once per turn. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 2 "Zoodiac" Xyz Monsters you control; attach 1 of them to the other as Xyz Material.
